page.title: 13CONSERVATION AREAS
page.content: The areas around the{PARISH CHURCH}and at {BRAMLEY GREEN}have been identified as having a particular charm resulting from the pleasant grouping of older builings with natural landscape features.These areas have been designated as {CONSERVATION AREAS}. There are two conservation areas in{ {BRAMLEY.}The first has a little bit of woodland included in it.It goes from { {YORK COTTAGE}to{MIDDLE FARM COTTAGE} and down to{HONEY FARM}across to{ {STREET COTTAGE.}The conservation area is around these farms. The second area is not as large as the first.It is mainly composed of { {BRAMLEY GREEN},but includes some of the housing around its' perimeter.
